revised_title: Tide Observations and Phenomena in Petropaulofsk, Kamtchatka
tldr: The author analyzes tide observations made in Petropaulofsk, Kamtchatka, and discovers unique tidal phenomena, including a large diurnal inequality affecting both the time and height of tides. The author also observes a single-day tide phenomenon, where two half-daily tides merge into one, due to the temporary check in the rise and fall of the water.
